title: 820-3462-A no green light
message:
I'm trying to figure out whats wrong with this board there's no green light
PPBUS_G3H - Present
PP3V42_G3H - Present 
SMC_RESET_L - Present
SMC_DCIN_ISENSE - Missing
SMC_BC_ACOK - Present
PP5V_S5 - missing

title: 820-3462-A no green light
message: SMC is not running. Was there corrosion around SMC?

title: 820-3462-A no green light
message: no corrosion around smc. how do i test it to be 100% sure that is the smc?

title: 820-3462-A no green light
message: To be 100% sure you replace it with a 100% new one. None of that is possible so just replace it with one from a scrap board and pray that it works.

title: 820-3462-A no green light
message:
I replace the SMC and the fan is spinning I have a green light but there's no imagine and there's no chime. When I press the Shift+Control+Option I get a green light and then an orange one that means the SMC is resting. Is it something to do with CPU Vcore?
PPVCORE_S0_CPU is 0.95V
PPVCORE_S0_AXG is 0V

title: 820-3462-A no green light
message: USB mouse lights up when plugged in?

title: 820-3462-A no green light
message: no light when I plug the mouse

title: 820-3462-A no green light
message: Where did your replacement SMC come from?

title: 820-3462-A no green light
message: Aliexpress from a board. Do I need to replace the SMC again?

title: 820-3462-A no green light
message: It could be anything at this point. All power is there so it could be a bad SMC. It could be the termination resistors in the U6100 data lines. Did the SMC come from an identical board?

title: 820-3462-A no green light
message: Yes it come from identical board. I place another order I'm waiting for it. Thanks
